context: Zebra Technologies Corporation is a enterprise asset tracking company focused on barcode printers, RFID, mobile computers, and software. Acquired Motorola Solutions enterprise division.

competitors.name: Honeywell International
competitors.notes: Major competitor across multiple product categories including mobile computers and scanners

competitors.name: Datalogic
competitors.notes: Competitor in automatic data capture and barcode scanning

competitors.name: Toshiba
competitors.notes: Competitor in barcode printing and enterprise mobility

competitors.name: Panasonic
competitors.notes: Competitor in rugged mobile computing devices

competitors.name: Hewlett Packard
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise technology and mobile solutions

competitors.name: Cisco Systems
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise networking and mobility infrastructure
